author: jukka
msg: OAK-1184: Uploading large number of files to single folder fails.
A list bucket can't contain more entries than there can be references to other segments

author: jukka
msg: OAK-1184: Uploading large number of files to single folder fails.
Need to flush already when refcount reaches SEGMENT_REFERENCE_LIMIT,
not just when it exceeds it. Otherwise there's a conflict on the 0xff
refid used for the current segment.
